page.title: 17Wick Quarry
page.content: The Quarry is owned by Western Roadstone,a subsidairy of the R.M.C group of companies.They blast limestone out ofthe rock every two or three times a week.Approximately 70people are employed in the quarry complex.They will able to carry on getting stone out of the quarry for about another 30 years.The stone is used for building and road construction.The blasting time is between 13.00 to 13.30 .They blast the same time every day.When they blast they warn people by blowing a hooter.When the quarry has been finshed with it could be used for a waste tip or a leisure centre or something like that.
